__e: You don't see as much colored help these days.
I need only bring two more servants.
Just can't trust the help these days.
This is a noble house, and servants should know how to do their duties.
- The family and servants are clean.
But all the other domestics are here. Why isn't he here?
- 3,000 lire per day for meat, 5,000 lire per day for servants, just to be on the safe side and 10,000 lire per day for car and driver!
Papa, how may I be too high in rank to dine with the servants and too low to dine with my family?
That includes me, the servants and even you.
